fvs.taxe.controller

Class ResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fvs.taxe.controller.ResourceController

  • public class ResourceController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for updating UI with resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceController(Context context)
      The instantiation method sets up a listener that updates the player Resources graphics when the player changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawHeaderText()
      This method draws a header above the player resources.
      void drawPlayerResources(Player player)
      This method draws a specific player's resources.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        The instantiation method sets up a listener that updates the player Resources graphics when the player changes.

        context - The context of the game

    • Method Detail

      • drawHeaderText

        public void drawHeaderText()
        This method draws a header above the player resources.

      • drawPlayerResources

        public void drawPlayerResources(Player player)
        This method draws a specific player's resources.
        Parameters:
        player - The active player who's resources should be drawn.
